MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the FK9 postcode area of Stirling. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:30am to complete a permanent repair to our underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 09:27am on the 6th of Novmber 2020.
